00061 GenoQC::Reg GenoQC::reg;
00062 
00063 GenoQC * GenoQC::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00064 {
00065         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == GenoQC::EngineName())
00066                 return (GenoQC *)engine;
00067         return NULL;
00068 }
00069 
00070 // constructor
00071 GenoQC::GenoQC(ChipLayout *chipLayout) {
00072   m_kitao_db=NULL;
00073 
00074   defineOptions();
00075 
00076   if(chipLayout != NULL) {
00077       m_FreeChipLayout = false;
00078       m_ChipLayout = chipLayout;
00079   } else {
00080       m_FreeChipLayout = true;
00081       m_ChipLayout = NULL;
00082   }
00083   m_Report = NULL;
00084 }
00085 
00086 GenoQC::~GenoQC() {
00087   clear();
00088 }
00089 
00090 void GenoQC::clear()
00091 {
00092   for(int cl = 0; cl < (int)m_CelListeners.size(); cl ++)
00093     Freez(m_CelListeners[cl]);
00094   m_CelListeners.clear();
00095   Freez(m_Report);
00096   //
00097   if (m_kitao_db!=NULL) {
00098     delete m_kitao_db;
00099     m_kitao_db=NULL;
00100   }
00101 }
00102 
00103 void GenoQC::defineOptions() {
00104 
00105   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00106 
00107   defineOption("c", "cdf-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00108                      "File defining probe sets.",
00109                      "");
00110   defineOption("", "spf-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00111                      "SPF File defining probe sets.",
00112                      "");
00113   defineOption("q", "qcc-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00114                      "File defining QC probesets.",
00115                      "");
00116   defineOption("a", "qca-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00117                      "File defining QC analysis methods.",
00118                      "");
00119   defineOption("", "cel-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00120                      "Text file specifying cel files to process, one per line with the first line being 'cel_files'.",
00121                      "");
00122   defineOption("", "chrX-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00123                      "File containing probe_id (1-based) of probes on chrX. "
00124                      "Used for copy number probe chrX/Y ratio gender calling. "
00125                      "[Experimental]",
00126                      "");
00127   defineOption("", "chrY-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00128                      "File containing probe_id (1-based) of probes on chrY. "
00129                      "Used for copy number probe chrX/Y ratio gender calling. "
00130                      "[Experimental]",
00131                      "");
00132   defineOption("", "chrZ-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00133                      "File containing probe_id (1-based) of probes on chrZ. "
00134                      "Used for copy number probe chrZ/W ratio avian gender calling. "
00135                      "[Experimental]",
00136                      "");
00137   defineOption("", "chrW-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00138                      "File containing probe_id (1-based) of probes on chrW. "
00139                      "Used for copy number probe chrZ/W ratio avian gender calling. "
00140                      "[Experimental]",
00141                      "");
00142   defineOption("", "probe-class-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00143                     "File containing probe_id (1-based) of "
00144                           "probes and a 'class' designation. Used to  "
00145                           "compute mean probe intensity by class for "
00146                           "report file.",
00147                     "");
00148   defineOption("","target-sketch", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00149                          "Sketch file.",
00150                          "");
00151   defineOption("","channel-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00152                "Channel file.",
00153                "");
00154   //
00155   defineOption("","reagent-kit-discriminator",PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00156                "list of probeset names with pc1s and means to use for "
00157                "classifying the reagent kits.",
00158                "");
00159 //  defineOption("","reagent-kit-discriminator",PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00160 //               "list of probeset names with pc1s and means to use for "
00161 //               "classifying the reagent kits.",
00162 //               "");
00163 
00164   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00165 
00166   defineOption("", "out-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00167                "Name to use for the output file.",
00168                "apt-geno-qc.report.txt");
00169   defineOption("", "dm-out", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00170                "Folder to use for DM output. Enables DM "
00171                "output. One per CEL file. [experimental]",
00172                "");
00173 
00174   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00175 
00176   defineOption("", "dm-het-mult", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00177                      "DM Het Mult to use for DM output. [default '1.25']",
00178                      "1.25");
00179   defineOption("", "dm-thresh", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00180                      "DM threshold to use for making no calls. [default '0.33']",
00181                      "0.33");
00182   defineOption("", "female-thresh", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00183                     "Threshold for calling females when using cn-probe-chrXY-ratio or cn-probe-chrZW-ratio method.",
00184                     "0.48");
00185   defineOption("", "male-thresh", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00186                     "Threshold for calling females when using cn-probe-chrXY-ratio or cn-probe-chrZW-ratio method.",
00187                     "0.71");
00188 
00189   defineOptionSection("Engine Options (Not used on command line)");
00190 
00191   defOptMult("", "cels", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00192              "Cel files to process.",
00193              "");
00194 }

00198   /**
00199    * @brief Populate the input qcAnalysisOptions from qca file
00200    * @param qcaFile - the file to read
00201    */
00202 void GenoQC::readQCAFile(std::string qcaFile) {
00203   APT_ERR_ASSERT(qcaFile!="","qcaFile cannot be blank.");
00204   QCAnalysisOptions::readQCAFile(qcaFile, qcAnalysisOpts);
00205 }
00206 
00207   /**
00208    * @brief Populate the input qcProbesetOptions from qcc file
00209    * @param qccFile - the file to read
00210    */
00211 void GenoQC::readQCCFile(std::string qccFile) {
00212   APT_ERR_ASSERT(qccFile!="","qccFile cannot be blank.");
00213   QCProbesetOptions::readQCCFile(qccFile, qcProbesetOpts);
00214   // copy the temp-dir to the options as it will be passed down into GimmieContrast
00215   qcProbesetOpts.m_tempdir=getOpt("temp-dir");
00216   //printf("### JHG: readQCCFile(): temp-dir='%s'\n",qcProbesetOpts.m_tempdir.c_str());
00217 }
00218 
00219 /**
00220  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00221  */
00222 void GenoQC::checkOptionsImp()
00223 {
00224     defineStates();
00225 
00226     setLibFileOpt("cdf-file");
00227     setLibFileOpt("spf-file");
00228     setLibFileOpt("qcc-file");
00229     setLibFileOpt("qca-file");
00230     setLibFileOpt("target-sketch");
00231     setLibFileOpt("channel-file");
00232     setLibFileOpt("chrX-probes");
00233     setLibFileOpt("chrY-probes");
00234     setLibFileOpt("chrZ-probes");
00235     setLibFileOpt("chrW-probes");
00236     setLibFileOpt("probe-class-file");
00237     setLibFileOpt("reagent-kit-discriminator");
00238 
00239     if(getOpt("out-file") == "") {
00240         Err::errAbort("Must provide an output file using --out-file option.");
00241     }
00242     
00243     /* Read in cel file list from other file if specified. */
00244     vector<string> celFiles;
00245     EngineUtil::getCelFiles(celFiles, this);
00246     if (celFiles.size() == 0) {
00247       Err::errAbort("No cel files specified.");
00248     }
00249     setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00250 
00251     //std::string tmpstr;
00252     //tmpstr=getOpt("temp-dir");
00253     //printf("### JHG: GenoQC::checkOptionsImp(): temp-dir-1: '%s'\n",tmpstr.c_str());
00254 
00255     /// @todo this should be in BaseEngine?
00256     if (getOpt("temp-dir")=="") {
00257       std::string temp_dir=Fs::dirname(getOpt("out-file"));
00258       if (temp_dir=="") {
00259         temp_dir=".";
00260       }
00261       setOpt("temp-dir",temp_dir);
00262     }
00263 
00264     //tmpstr=getOpt("temp-dir");
00265     //printf("### JHG: GenoQC::checkOptionsImp(): temp-dir-2: '%s'\n",tmpstr.c_str());
00266 
00267     readQCAFile(getOpt("qca-file"));
00268     readQCCFile(getOpt("qcc-file"));
00269 
00270   // no setLibFileOpt call as we dont want it them be expanded.
00271   qcProbesetOpts.m_sketchInFile=getOpt("target-sketch");
00272   qcProbesetOpts.m_channelFile=getOpt("channel-file");
00273 
00274   ///@todo allow computing of DM calls when no qcc/qca file
00275     int nMethods = qcAnalysisOpts.methods.size();
00276     if((nMethods < 0) && getOpt("dm-out") == "")
00277         Err::errAbort("There is at least one method need to be specified");
00278 
00279     // check that SNP lists are available
00280     for(int i = 0; i < nMethods; i ++) {
00281         string key = qcAnalysisOpts.methods[i].groupName;
00282 
00283         // snp list specified by a map
00284         if(key != "") 
00285             if(qcProbesetOpts.probesetGroups.find(key) == 
00286                 qcProbesetOpts.probesetGroups.end())
00287                 Err::errAbort("SNP list:" + qcAnalysisOpts.methods[i].groupName + " does not exist");
00288 
00289     }
00290 
00291     // This is not great in that it causes a copy of the 
00292     // probeset lists - which can be quite large. On the
00293     // other hand keeping just a pointer seems a bit
00294     // dangerous as one could initialize with one set of options
00295     // and then modify them before computing the stats. 
00296     if(getOptBool("force"))
00297         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Chip type force option was chosen, no chip type validation will be done!");
00298     else
00299         CheckChipType();
00300 
00301     // create output folder for DM calls
00302         std::string strDmOut = getOpt("dm-out");
00303     if(strDmOut != "") {
00304         if(!Fs::isWriteableDir(strDmOut)) {
00305             if(Fs::mkdirPath(strDmOut, false) != APT_OK) {
00306                 Err::errAbort("Can't make or write to directory: " + strDmOut);
00307             }
00308         }
00309     }
00310 
00311 }
00312 
00313 // Compute the various metrics over all chips.
00314 void GenoQC::runImp() {
00315   //
00316   if(m_ChipLayout == NULL)
00317     m_ChipLayout = new ChipLayout();
00318   //
00319   map<string,bool> psMap;
00320   map<string,bool>::iterator psMapIter;
00321   std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> probeSetsToLoad;
00322 
00323  try { // outer try for handling exception
00324   try { // inner try for memory cleanup
00325     Verbose::out(1, "Initializing QC Process.");
00326     Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: Running GenoQC.");
00327 
00328     int nChips = (int)getOptVector("cels").size();
00329     int nMethods = qcAnalysisOpts.methods.size();
00330     
00331     // KitAO - part 1
00332     if (getOpt("reagent-kit-discriminator")!="") {
00333       m_kitao_db=new KitAODb();
00334       APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_kitao_db!=NULL,"internal error.");
00335       m_kitao_db->readTsv(getOpt("reagent-kit-discriminator"));
00336       // add these names to the probesets to load in case we end up loading
00337       // m_ChipLayout on our own.
00338       for (KitAODb::name2entry_iter_t entry_i=m_kitao_db->m_name2entry.begin();
00339            entry_i!=m_kitao_db->m_name2entry.end();
00340            entry_i++) {
00341         probeSetsToLoad.insert(entry_i->first.c_str());
00342       }
00343     }
00344 
00345 
00346     // Figure out the union of all qc probeset lists
00347     // if the user wants dm calls, then we leave the set empty so that
00348     // everything is loaded.
00349     if (getOpt("dm-out") == "") {
00350       Verbose::out(1,"Figuring out what probesets to load...");
00351       //
00352       std::string ps_name;
00353       std::string group_name;
00354       vector<pair<string,string> > *vPtr;
00355 
00356       for(int m = 0; m < nMethods; m ++) {
00357         group_name=qcAnalysisOpts.methods[m].groupName;
00358         Verbose::out(1,"Loading group '"+group_name+"'");
00359         //vector<string> *vPtr = &qcProbesetOpts.probesetGroups[qcAnalysisOpts.methods[m].groupName];
00360         //
00361         vPtr=&qcProbesetOpts.probesetGroups[group_name];
00362         for (int i=0; i < vPtr->size(); i++) {
00363           psMap[vPtr->at(i).first] = true;
00364         }
00365         // multiple probeset lists are required by this method 
00366         // and we need to get the lists from the options
00367         if (qcAnalysisOpts.methods[m].analysis == QCMethod::ADJHOMHILO) {
00368           vPtr = &qcProbesetOpts.probesetGroups[qcAnalysisOpts.methods[m].options["ps.rand"]];
00369           for(int i=0; i < vPtr->size(); i++) {
00370             psMap[vPtr->at(i).first] = true;
00371           }
00372           vPtr = &qcProbesetOpts.probesetGroups[qcAnalysisOpts.methods[m].options["ps.set1"]];
00373           for(int i=0; i < vPtr->size(); i++) {
00374             psMap[vPtr->at(i).first] = true;
00375           }
00376           vPtr = &qcProbesetOpts.probesetGroups[qcAnalysisOpts.methods[m].options["ps.set2"]];
00377           for (int i=0; i < vPtr->size(); i++) {
00378             psMap[vPtr->at(i).first] = true;
00379           }
00380         }
00381       }
00382       //
00383       for(psMapIter=psMap.begin(); psMapIter != psMap.end(); psMapIter++) {
00384         probeSetsToLoad.insert(psMapIter->first.c_str());
00385         //printf("probeSetsToLoad: '%s'\n",psMapIter->first.c_str());
00386       }
00387     }
00388 
00389     // get the chip layout if one was not passed in to the constructor
00390     if (m_FreeChipLayout) {
00391         std::set<affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType> psTypesToLoadEmpty;
00392         std::vector<bool> probeSubsetEmpty;
00393         std::string stringEmpty;
00394         std::string strCdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
00395         std::string strSpfFile = getOpt("spf-file");
00396         if (strCdfFile != "") {
00397           Verbose::out(1,"Opening cdf file: " + strCdfFile);
00398           m_ChipLayout->openCdf(strCdfFile,probeSetsToLoad, probeSubsetEmpty, stringEmpty);
00399         } 
00400         else if(strSpfFile != "") {
00401           Verbose::out(1,"Opening spf file: " + strSpfFile);
00402           m_ChipLayout->openSpf(strSpfFile,
00403                                 probeSetsToLoad,
00404                                 NULL,
00405                                 probeSubsetEmpty,
00406                                 stringEmpty,
00407                                 false,
00408                                 psTypesToLoadEmpty
00409                                 );
00410         } 
00411         else {
00412           Err::errAbort("Must provide a CDF or SPF file.");
00413         }
00414     }
00415     
00416     // create our reporter
00417     std::vector<std::string> cels = getOptVector("cels");
00418     m_Report = new QuantMethodRunReport(cels);
00419     m_Report->setFormat(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
00420     m_Report->setUseDefaultSuffix(0); // avoid default report.txt suffix
00421     m_Report->setFilename(getOpt("out-file"));
00422 
00423     // Go through each method and setup a CEL listener, attach to reporter
00424     for(int m = 0; m < nMethods; m ++) {
00425         m_CelListeners.push_back(
00426             qcAnalysisOpts.methods[m].createCelListener(
00427                 m_ChipLayout,cels,qcProbesetOpts));
00428         ChipSummary *chipSummary = dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(m_CelListeners[m]);
00429         if(chipSummary != NULL)
00430             m_Report->registerChipSummary(chipSummary);
00431 
00432         // save some memory
00433         DmListener *dmListener = dynamic_cast<DmListener *>(m_CelListeners[m]);
00434         if(dmListener != NULL)
00435             dmListener->setKeepGenotypes(false);
00436     }
00437 
00438     // Create other CelListeners not specified in QCA file
00439     // CN probe based gender calling
00440     bool zw_gender_calling = false;
00441     if (getOpt("chrZ-probes") != "") {
00442         setOpt("chrX-probes", getOpt("chrZ-probes"));
00443         setOpt("chrY-probes", getOpt("chrW-probes"));
00444         zw_gender_calling = true;
00445     }
00446     if(getOpt("chrX-probes") != "") {
00447         CnProbeGenderCelListener *cnProbeCelListener = 
00448             new CnProbeGenderCelListener(getOpt("chrX-probes"), getOpt("chrY-probes"), getOptDouble("female-thresh"), getOptDouble("male-thresh"), zw_gender_calling);
00449         m_CelListeners.push_back(cnProbeCelListener);
00450 
00451         ChipSummary *chipSummary = dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(cnProbeCelListener);
00452         if(chipSummary != NULL)
00453             m_Report->registerChipSummary(chipSummary);
00454     }
00455 
00456     // Cel Stat Listener
00457     if(getOpt("probe-class-file") != "") {
00458         map<string, vector<bool> > masks;
00459     
00460         vector<bool> pmMask = m_ChipLayout->getPmProbeMask();
00461         masks["pm"] = pmMask;
00462     
00463         vector<bool> mmMask = m_ChipLayout->getMmProbeMask();
00464         int mmCount = 0;
00465         for(int i=0; i<mmMask.size(); i++)
00466             if(mmMask[i])
00467                 mmCount++;
00468         if(mmCount > 5000) {
00469             masks["mm"] = mmMask;
00470         }
00471 
00472         map<string, vector<bool> >::iterator maskIter;
00473         EngineUtil::readProbeClassFile(getOpt("probe-class-file"), m_ChipLayout->getProbeCount(), masks);
00474         for(maskIter = masks.begin(); maskIter != masks.end(); maskIter++) {
00475             int count = 0;
00476             for(vector<bool>::iterator mIx = maskIter->second.begin(); mIx != maskIter->second.end(); mIx++)
00477                 if(*mIx) 
00478                     count++;
00479             Verbose::out(2,"Number of " + maskIter->first + " probes is: " + ToStr(count));
00480         }
00481 
00482         CelStatListener *celStats = new CelStatListener(masks);
00483         m_CelListeners.push_back(celStats);
00484 
00485         ChipSummary *chipSummary = dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(celStats);
00486         if(chipSummary != NULL)
00487             m_Report->registerChipSummary(chipSummary);
00488     }
00489     /// @todo  DM chrX het rate gender calling?
00490 
00491     // setup dmProbesets
00492     vector<ProbeListPacked> dmProbesets;
00493     if(getOpt("dm-out") != "") {
00494         for(uint32_t i = 0; i < m_ChipLayout->getProbeSetCount(); i++) {
00495             ProbeListPacked pl = m_ChipLayout->getProbeListAtIndex(i);
00496             ProbeSet *ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(pl);
00497             if(DmListener::okForDm(ps))
00498                 dmProbesets.push_back(pl);
00499             delete ps;
00500         }
00501     }
00502 
00503     // KitAO - part 2
00504     if (getOpt("reagent-kit-discriminator")!="") {
00505       APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_kitao_db!=NULL,"internal error.");
00506       //
00507       KitAOCelListener* kitaocellistener=new KitAOCelListener();
00508       kitaocellistener->setDb(m_kitao_db);
00509       kitaocellistener->setLayout(m_ChipLayout);
00510 
00511       kitaocellistener->m_sketchFileName=getOpt("target-sketch");
00512       APT_ERR_ASSERT(kitaocellistener->m_sketchFileName!="",
00513                      "a target sketch is required.");
00514       //
00515       m_CelListeners.push_back(kitaocellistener);
00516       ChipSummary *chipSummary = dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(kitaocellistener);
00517       m_Report->registerChipSummary(chipSummary);
00518     }
00519 
00520     //// now the work is done over each cel file.
00521     Verbose::out(1, "Processing CEL files for genotype QC analysis:");
00522     for(int celIx = 0; celIx < nChips; celIx ++)
00523     {
00524         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData CEL;
00525         CEL.SetFileName(cels[celIx].c_str());
00526 
00527         if(!CEL.Exists()) 
00528             Err::errAbort("CEL file " + cels[celIx] + " does not exist");
00529     
00530         Verbose::out(1, "Processing " + ToStr(celIx + 1) + " of " + ToStr(nChips) + ": " + CEL.GetFileName());
00531     
00532         // read in the cel file
00533         if(!CEL.Read())
00534             Err::errAbort("Can not read CEL file " + cels[celIx]);
00535 
00536         // Pass to each CEL listener
00537         for(int cl = 0; cl < m_CelListeners.size(); cl ++) 
00538           m_CelListeners[cl]->newChip(&CEL);
00539         
00540         // Generate DM call output if requested
00541         if(getOpt("dm-out") != "") {
00542             affx::TsvFile tsv;
00543             tsv.defineColumn(0,0,"probeset_id");
00544             tsv.defineColumn(0,1,"call");
00545             tsv.defineColumn(0,2,"confidence");
00546             tsv.addHeaderComment("Calls: -1=NN, 0=AA, 1=AB, 2=BB");
00547             tsv.addHeader("cdf-file",getOpt("cdf-file"));
00548             tsv.addHeader("spf-file",getOpt("spf-file"));
00549             tsv.addHeader("cel-file",cels[celIx]);
00550             tsv.addHeader("number-SNPs",(int)dmProbesets.size());
00551             tsv.addHeader("dm-thresh",getOpt("dm-thresh"));
00552             tsv.addHeader("dm-het-mult",getOpt("dm-het-mult"));
00553             string filename = cels[celIx];
00554             filename = Fs::noextname1(filename)+".dm.txt";
00555             filename = Fs::join(getOpt("dm-out"),Fs::basename(filename));
00556             tsv.writeTsv_v1(filename);
00557 
00558             for(int psIx = 0; psIx < dmProbesets.size(); psIx++){
00559                 ProbeSet *ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(dmProbesets[psIx]);
00560                 vector<CQuartet> qVec;
00561                 DmListener::fillInQuartet(qVec,ps,&CEL);
00562                 std::pair<float,int> call;
00563                 string name = ps->name;
00564                 tsv.set(0,0,name);
00565                 tsv.set(0,1,(int)-1);
00566                 tsv.set(0,2,(float)1.0);
00567                 if(CallDM(qVec,call,getOptDouble("dm-het-mult"))) {
00568                     if(call.first < getOptDouble("dm-thresh"))
00569                         tsv.set(0,1,call.second);
00570                     else
00571                         tsv.set(0,1,(int)-1);
00572                     tsv.set(0,2,call.first);
00573                 }else{
00574                     Verbose::out(1,"DM Call on probeset " + name + " failed.");
00575                 }
00576                 tsv.writeLevel(0);
00577                 delete ps;
00578             }
00579         }
00580 
00581         CEL.Close();
00582     } 
00583 
00584     // Flush metrics to report file
00585     if(!m_Report->finish()) {
00586       Err::errAbort("Problem writing the report file " + getOpt("out-file"));
00587     }
00588     //
00589     probeSetsToLoad.clear();
00590     psMap.clear();
00591 
00592   } // end inner try
00593   catch (...) {
00594     // free up memory
00595    
00596     if(m_FreeChipLayout)
00597         Freez(m_ChipLayout);
00598     clear();
00599 
00600     //re-throw
00601     throw;
00602   }
00603  } // end outer try
00604  /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
00605  catch(Except &e) {
00606    Verbose::out(0,"");
00607    Err::errAbort(e.what());
00608  }
00609  catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00610    Verbose::out(0,"");
00611    Err::errAbort("Ran out of memory. "
00612                  "Try using quitting other applications.");
00613  }
00614  catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00615    Verbose::out(0,"");
00616    /// @todo The error message is null for most calvin files.
00617    ///       But we should mark this as a calvin exception so users know.
00618    Err::errAbort("Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00619                  "Bad Calvin File: "
00620                  "Description: '" +StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()) + "'");
00621  }
00622  catch(BroadException &e) {
00623    Verbose::out(0,"");
00624    Err::errAbort("Exception. msg: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00625                  ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00626  }
00627  catch(const std::exception &e) {
00628    Verbose::out(0,"");
00629    Err::errAbort("Exception caught. "
00630                  "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00631  }
00632  catch(...) {
00633    Verbose::out(0,"");
00634    Err::errAbort("Unknown exception caught.");
00635  }
00636 
00637  // free up memory
00638  if(m_FreeChipLayout)
00639     Freez(m_ChipLayout);
00640  clear();
00641 }
00642 
00643 // Check the chip type
00644 void GenoQC::CheckChipType() {
00645     Verbose::out(1, "Checking chip type on all cel files.");
00646     colrow_t numRows, numCols;
00647     int probeCount;
00648     int probeSetCount;
00649     vector<string> chipTypes;
00650 
00651     std::string strCdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
00652     std::string strSpfFile = getOpt("spf-file");
00653     std::vector<std::string> cels = getOptVector("cels");
00654 
00655     if(strCdfFile != "") {
00656       EngineUtil::getCdfChipType(chipTypes, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, strCdfFile);
00657     }
00658     else {
00659       EngineUtil::getSpfChipType(chipTypes, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, strSpfFile);
00660     }
00661 
00662     EngineUtil::checkCelChipTypes(chipTypes, probeCount, cels, numRows, numCols);
00663     if ((getOpt("chrX-probes") != "") && !getOptBool("force")) {
00664       EngineUtil::checkTsvFileChipType(getOpt("chrX-probes"), chipTypes);
00665     }
00666     if ((getOpt("chrY-probes") != "") && !getOptBool("force")) {
00667       EngineUtil::checkTsvFileChipType(getOpt("chrY-probes"), chipTypes);
00668     }
00669 }
